clients.name: my-node-app
clients.description: My-node-app runs at localhost:3000. The root URL is necessary to Authorization code flow works.

clients.name: my-react-app
clients.description: My-react-app runs at localhost:3018. It uses the Implicit flow

clients.name: my-sinatra-app
clients.description: My-sinatra-app runs at localhost:3006. The root URL is necessary to Authorization code flow works.

clientScopes.name: acr
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add acr (authentication context class reference) to the token

clientScopes.name: web-origins
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add allowed web origins to the access token

clientScopes.name: roles
clientScopes.description: OpenID Connect scope for add user roles to the access token
